title: karuNatOnu nannu brOva
sahitya:
karuNatOnu nannu brOva taruNamidE svAmi paramahamsa shrI gurO nIpAda padma golicitini


anupallavi

  erugi laukika jIvitamu vyathita manEvika cuTAgi nigama gUDala nerUngaviccu nirata jIviyaina nIvu


caraNam    dayAsindhu nIku sari samAna vErevarulErani cidAnanda mIvari nIvani nammitini
sadA parabrahma dhyAnamosagumani vEDitini sadAshiva brahmaguru krpa salupumu
